edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project

Class Hallway

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.Square
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.Hallway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hallway
extends Square
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a Square that represents a hallway in the game. The hallway can either be clear or there can be ninjas present.
    See Also:
